```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(connectwidgets)
library(dplyr)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE)

client <- connect(
  server  = "https://colorado.rstudio.com/rsc", #Sys.getenv("CONNECT_SERVER"),
  api_key = Sys.getenv("CONNECT_API_KEY")
  )

all_content <- client %>%
  content()

sample_content <- all_content %>% slice_sample(prop = .3)
```

![](https://source.unsplash.com/1920x1080/?forest "A random forest.")

## Components

### card

```{r card}
sample_content %>% by_tag("Server Audit")
  slice(1) %>%
  rsccard()
```

### grid

```{r grid}
sample_content %>%
  rscgrid()
```

### table

```{r table}
sample_content %>%
  rsctable()
```

### search & filter

```{r search-and-filter}
bscols(rscsearch(all_content), rscfilter(all_content), widths = c(2, 2))
rsctable(all_content)
```
